area.key: Beta software This is an early beta release of uSync.Migrations. Things may not function as expected, code may change, etc.
uSync.Migrations is a tool to help you migrate your site settings and content from Umbraco 7.x to the latest and greatest versions of Umbraco.
You can customize this list with a you own `ISyncMigrationProfile` or remove and add simple configs with a '/usync/profiles.json' file.
